title: HF Emergency Communication Network
explain: The HF emergency communication network is an emergency military communication network based on national military communication infrastructure, and featured by long communication distance, flexible networking, quickly set up, etc. It can provide basic communication means for the encrypted information, command and communication among national command center, important military base, tactical command post and combat units. And it is suitable for some military scenarios such as emergency rescue, anti-terrorist, high intensity war and long distance communication.
